pageContext.claim: “And, by the way, it's very important, because I could have done a much less expensive version. I could have done a much easier version, but a version that people would get over very easily.”
pageContext.analysis: The border fencing built under former president George W. Bush was much less expensive than what is being built under Trump. But that doesn't mean Trump’s barrier is more effective. Smugglers have already cut through sections it.
